text: The 2019–20 season was Hellas Verona Football Club's 29th season in Serie A and their first back in the top-flight after being relegated to Serie B at the end of the 2017–18 Serie A season. The club finished 5th in the 2018–19 Serie B season and were promoted via winning the play-off. ==Players== ===Squad information=== :Last updated on 8 February 2020 :Appearances include league matches
